meaningMnemonic: Remember how 不孝 is "disobedience to parents"? Well, <kanji>someone</kanji> who shows <kanji>disobedience to parents</kanji> is a <vocabulary>disobedient child</vocabulary> or an <vocabulary>unfilial child</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: 不孝 is a reading you should know already. Add the もの reading for 者 and you have yourself a reading. Now go be obedient to your parents and keep studying your kanji.
